message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value product. I believe you'll find it's worth the investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.
I appreciate your time and consideration, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a fair price for this product.
I understand you're looking to negotiate, but I have to consider my own interests as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $850000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'd like to propose a price of $775000. Is that something we can work with?
I'm still not willing to go below $825000, but I'm willing to make a slight concession. I can offer it to you for $820000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'd like to propose a price of $795000. Is that something we can work with?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $810000. This is my last concession, and I hope we can finalize the deal.
I appreciate your last concession, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'd like to propose a price of $790000. If we can't meet here, I'll have to consider other options.
